body:
This is part of what I have in my public ActionResult ExternalLoginCallback(string returnUrl) method, which is the method called from the external OpenId server (Intuit's in this case, but it shouldn't matter).

//Attempt to log the user in if they've already created an account with the external login.
if (OAuthWebSecurity.Login(result.Provider, result.ProviderUserId, createPersistentCookie: false))
{        
    return RedirectToLocal(returnUrl);
}
title: How to log in user after OpenId authentication
